verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H7970>thirtieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> [day] of the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> while I was by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1473>exiles,<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> were <S%H6605>opened<s%> and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
(On the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> Jehoiachin's <S%H1546>exile,<s%>

the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H1961>expressly<s%> to <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H941>Buzi,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> upon him.)

And as I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H9370>storm<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> was <S%H935>coming<s%> from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3947>flashing<s%> <S%H3947>forth<s%> continually and a <S%H5051>bright<s%> <S%H5051>light<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> it, and in its <S%H8432>midst<s%> something like <S%H2830>glowing<s%> <S%H2830>metal<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H8432>within<s%> it there were <S%H1823>figures<s%> <S%H1823>resembling<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings.<s%> And <S%H2088>this<s%> was their <S%H4758>appearance:<s%> they had <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H1823>form.<s%>
<S%H259>Each<s%> of them had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And their <S%H7272>legs<s%> were <S%H3477>straight<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> were like a calf's <S%H3709>hoof,<s%> <S%H7272><s%> and they <S%H5340>gleamed<s%> like <S%H7044>burnished<s%> <S%H5178>bronze.<s%>

<S%H8478>Under<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides<s%> [were] <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%> As for the <S%H6440>faces<s%> and <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H702>four<s%> of them,

their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H2266>touched<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H269>another;<s%> their [faces] did not <S%H5437>turn<s%> when they <S%H1980>moved,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>straight<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6440>forward.<s%>

As for the <S%H1823>form<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> [each] had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> all <S%H702>four<s%> had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H9030>lion<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H7794>bull<s%> on the <S%H8040>left,<s%> and all <S%H702>four<s%> had the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>

Such were their <S%H6440>faces.<s%> Their <S%H3671>wings<s%> were <S%H6504>spread<s%> out <S%H4480>above<s%><S%H4605>;<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2266>touching<s%> <S%H376>another<s%> [being,] and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3680>covering<s%> their <S%H1472>bodies.<s%>

And <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>straight<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6440>forward;<s%> <S%H413>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was about to <S%H1980>go,<s%> they would <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5437>turning<s%> as they <S%H1980>went.<s%>

In the midst of the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> there was something that <S%H4758>looked<s%> like <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H4758>like<s%> <S%H3940>torches<s%> <S%H1980>darting<s%> <S%H1980>back<s%> and forth <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings.<s%> The <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5051>bright,<s%> and <S%H1300>lightning<s%> was <S%H3318>flashing<s%> from the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
And the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> <S%H7519>ran<s%> to and <S%H7725>fro<s%> <S%H4758>like<s%> <S%H965>bolts<s%> of <S%H965>lightning.<s%>

Now as I <S%H7200>looked<s%> at the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings,<s%> for [each of] the <S%H702>four<s%> of them.

The <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> and their <S%H4639>workmanship<s%> [was] like <S%H5869>sparkling<s%> <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> and all <S%H702>four<s%> of them had the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H1823>form,<s%> their <S%H4758>appearance<s%> and <S%H4639>workmanship<s%> [being] as <S%H9201>if<s%> one <S%H212>wheel<s%> were <S%H8432>within<s%> <S%H212>another.<s%>
Whenever they <S%H1980>moved,<s%> they <S%H1980>moved<s%> in <S%H702>any<s%> of their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>directions,<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5437>turning<s%> as they <S%H1980>moved.<s%>

As for their <S%H1354>rims<s%> they were <S%H1363>lofty<s%> and <S%H3374>awesome,<s%> and the <S%H1354>rims<s%> of all <S%H702>four<s%> of them were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And whenever the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> <S%H1980>moved,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H1980>moved<s%> with them. And whenever the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> <S%H5375>rose<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5375>rose<s%> [also.]

<S%H5921>Wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was about to <S%H1980>go,<s%> they would <S%H1980>go<s%> in that <S%H8033>direction.<s%> And the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5375>rose<s%> <S%H5980>close<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> them; for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> [was] in the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

Whenever those <S%H1980>went,<s%> these <S%H1980>went;<s%> and whenever those <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5975>still,<s%> these <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5975>still.<s%> And whenever those <S%H5375>rose<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5375>rose<s%> <S%H5980>close<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> them; for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> [was] in the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

Now <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> [there was] something <S%H1823>like<s%> an <S%H7549>expanse,<s%> like the <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H5869>gleam<s%> of <S%H7140>crystal,<s%> <S%H5186>extended<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H4605><s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

And <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> [were stretched out] <S%H3477>straight,<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H269>other;<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> also had <S%H8147>two<s%> wings <S%H3680>covering<s%> their <S%H1472>bodies<s%> on the <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1992>side<s%> and on the <S%H2008>other.<s%>

I also <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of their <S%H3671>wings<s%> like the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H7227>abundant<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> as they <S%H1980>went,<s%> like the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> a <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H1999>tumult<s%> like the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of an <S%H4264>army<s%> <S%H4264>camp;<s%> whenever they <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5975>still,<s%> they <S%H7503>dropped<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And there <S%H1961>came<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> from <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> that was <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7218>heads;<s%> whenever they <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5975>still,<s%> they <S%H7503>dropped<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

Now <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> that was <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> there was <S%H1823>something<s%> <S%H1823>resembling<s%> a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> like <S%H68>lapis<s%> <S%H5601><s%> <S%H68>lazuli<s%> <S%H5601><s%> in <S%H4758>appearance;<s%> and on that <S%H1823>which<s%> <S%H1823>resembled<s%> a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H4480>high<s%> <S%H4605><s%> up, [was] a <S%H1823>figure<s%> with the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H120>man.<s%>

Then I <S%H7200>noticed<s%> from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of His <S%H4975>loins<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> <S%H4758>something<s%> like <S%H2830>glowing<s%> <S%H2830>metal<s%> that <S%H4758>looked<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> it, and from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of His <S%H4975>loins<s%> and <S%H4295>downward<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4758>something<s%> like <S%H784>fire;<s%> and [there was] a <S%H5051>radiance<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> Him.

As the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H7198>rainbow<s%> in the <S%H6051>clouds<s%> on a <S%H1653>rainy<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> [was] the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H5051>radiance.<s%> <S%H1931>Such<s%> [was] the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> And when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> [it,] I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face<s%> and <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H1696>speaking.<s%>
